dcterms:creator: I. Segura-Bedmar
P. Martínez
M. Herrero Zazo
dcterms:description: The SemEval-2013 DDI extraction dataset contains annotated sentences from biomedical texts, specifically focusing on drug-drug interactions. It includes various types of interactions such as Advice, Effect, Mechanism, and Interaction.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2013 DDI extraction dataset

dcterms:creator: I. Segura Bedmar
P. Martinez
D. Sánchez Cisneros
dcterms:description: DrugBank is a comprehensive database that contains detailed drug information, including drug-drug interactions, pharmacological data, and drug classifications.
dcterms:title: DrugBank

dcterms:description: Medline abstracts consist of biomedical research articles that provide a wealth of information on various medical topics, including drug interactions.
dcterms:title: Medline abstracts

dcterms:creator: M. Herrero-Zazo
I. Segura-Bedmar
P. Martínez
T. Declerck
dcterms:description: The DDI corpus is an annotated corpus that includes pharmacological substances and drug-drug interactions, providing a resource for training and evaluating DDI extraction systems.
dcterms:title: DDI corpus
